attributes.action: ban cylcle time tests on the A1 motorway in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cylcle time trails should be banned on the A1 motorway as the road should only be used for motor cars, bikes & lorrys etc. The motorway is used 7 days a week with all traffic going up to 70MPH and not bikes or walkers, this is too dangerous or poorly or not supervised at all
